ygData.subject: Re: Instill Doubt/Intimidate
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there a list somewhere of all our skills, including where they re available?  I want to know if I missed any along the way because they were only available
ygData.messageBody:
Is there a list somewhere of all our skills, including where they're
available? I want to know if I missed any along the way because they were
only available from one teacher.

Besides languages, I mean. )


> From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>
>
> Tim Burke wrote:
> >
> > From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
> >
> > On the Bard song web site, which is an excellent reference page, instill
> > doubt is listed as a skill at 26? Where is the skill? I dont see it on
my
> > list in Kelethin?
> >
> > Kerouac Dharmabum
> > Rodcent Lvl27
> >
>
> It is available ONLY in Freeport, from the male bard on the upper floor of
the
> Bard's Guild (on the west edge of North Freeport).
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
